languages.text: "Проктор Йегер — вы не имеете права угрожать Вольному Торговцу на {mf|его|ее} собственной планете". {n}Каждое слово произнесено негромким твердым голосом, каким-то образом перекрывающим вой сирен.{/n} "Особенно, когда баржи отправляются на Даргонус согласно приказу маршала. Если вам этого мало — я лично ручаюсь, что {name} фон Валанциус не находится в сговоре с неизвестным преступником".

"Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."
languages.original_text: "Проктор Йегер — вы не имеете права угрожать Вольному Торговцу на {mf|его|ее} собственной планете". {n}Каждое слово произнесено негромким твердым голосом, каким-то образом перекрывающим вой сирен.{/n} "Особенно, когда баржи отправляются на Даргонус согласно приказу маршала. Если вам этого мало — я лично ручаюсь, что {name} фон Валанциус не находится в сговоре с неизвестным преступником".

If that is not enough for you, I personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with an unknown criminal."

If that is not enough for you, I personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with an unknown criminal."

If that is not enough for you, I personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with an unknown criminal."

If that is not enough for you, I personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with an unknown criminal."

"Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

"Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

languages.text: «Procuradora Yeager, no tiene ningún derecho a amenazar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente en su propio planeta». {n}Solomorne pronuncia cada palabra con una voz suave pero segura que se sobrepone de alguna forma a las sirenas desesperadas.{/n} «Especialmente cuando las naves van a partir a Dargonus bajo órdenes del Mariscal. Si eso no le parece suficiente, puedo asegurarle personalmente que {name} von Valancius no está colaborando con ningún criminal desconocido».
languages.original_text: "Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

traits.locale_text: «Procuradora Yeager, no tiene ningún derecho a amenazar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente en su propio planeta». {n}Solomorne pronuncia cada palabra con una voz suave pero segura que se sobrepone de alguna forma a las sirenas desesperadas.{/n} «Especialmente cuando las naves van a partir a Dargonus bajo órdenes del Mariscal. Si eso no le parece suficiente, puedo asegurarle personalmente que {name} von Valancius no está colaborando con ningún criminal desconocido».

languages.text: “耶格尔监察官，你无权威胁行商浪人，尤其是在{mf|他|她}自己的领地上。”{n}索罗蒙以柔和而充满自信的语气说出了每个字，他的声音仿佛盖过了警报的鸣叫。{/n}“更何况，运送什一税的驳船正在按照元帅的命令，驶往达戈努斯。如果这个解释还不能让你满意，我可以以个人荣誉担保，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯没有与任何犯罪分子勾结。”
languages.original_text: "Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

traits.locale_text: “耶格尔监察官，你无权威胁行商浪人，尤其是在{mf|他|她}自己的领地上。”{n}索罗蒙以柔和而充满自信的语气说出了每个字，他的声音仿佛盖过了警报的鸣叫。{/n}“更何况，运送什一税的驳船正在按照元帅的命令，驶往达戈努斯。如果这个解释还不能让你满意，我可以以个人荣誉担保，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯没有与任何犯罪分子勾结。”

languages.text: 「代理人イェーガー、お前には自分の惑星でローグトレーダーを脅迫する権利はない」{n}ソロモーンはそれぞれの言葉を柔らかく、しかし自信のある声で、もの悲しいサイレンをかき消すように話す。{/n}「特に、将帥の命令で荷船がダルゴナスに送られるような場合には。それが十分でないというなら、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスがどこかの見知らぬ犯罪者と結託していないということを個人的に保証してもいい」
languages.original_text: "Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

traits.locale_text: 「代理人イェーガー、お前には自分の惑星でローグトレーダーを脅迫する権利はない」{n}ソロモーンはそれぞれの言葉を柔らかく、しかし自信のある声で、もの悲しいサイレンをかき消すように話す。{/n}「特に、将帥の命令で荷船がダルゴナスに送られるような場合には。それが十分でないというなら、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスがどこかの見知らぬ犯罪者と結託していないということを個人的に保証してもいい」

languages.text: « Proctor Yeager, rien ne vous autorise à menacer {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} sur sa propre planète. » {n}Solomorne prononce chaque mot d'une voix dont la douceur ne diminue en rien la fermeté, et contre toute attente, il parvient à se faire entendre clairement par-dessus le hurlement des sirènes.{/n} « D'autant plus que les barges partent pour Dargonus sur ordre du maréchal. Si cela ne vous suffit pas, sachez que je me porte garant de l'honnêteté de {name} von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

traits.locale_text: « Proctor Yeager, rien ne vous autorise à menacer {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} sur sa propre planète. » {n}Solomorne prononce chaque mot d'une voix dont la douceur ne diminue en rien la fermeté, et contre toute attente, il parvient à se faire entendre clairement par-dessus le hurlement des sirènes.{/n} « D'autant plus que les barges partent pour Dargonus sur ordre du maréchal. Si cela ne vous suffit pas, sachez que je me porte garant de l'honnêteté de {name} von Valancius. »

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Yeager, kendi gezegeninde Hür Tacir'i tehdit edemezsin." {n}Solomorne; uğuldayan siren seslerini bastıran, yumuşak ama kendinden emin bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hele ki mavnalar, Miralay'ın emriyle Dargonus'a gönderiliyorken. Şayet bu sana kâfi gelmiyorsa {name} von Valancius'un, adı sanı bilinmeyen bir suçluyla birlik olmadığına bizzat kefil olabilirim."
languages.original_text: "Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen Yeager, kendi gezegeninde Hür Tacir'i tehdit edemezsin." {n}Solomorne; uğuldayan siren seslerini bastıran, yumuşak ama kendinden emin bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hele ki mavnalar, Miralay'ın emriyle Dargonus'a gönderiliyorken. Şayet bu sana kâfi gelmiyorsa {name} von Valancius'un, adı sanı bilinmeyen bir suçluyla birlik olmadığına bizzat kefil olabilirim."

languages.text: "Proktorin Yeager, Ihr habt kein Recht, {mf|einem Freihändler auf seinem|einer Freihändlerin auf ihrem} eigenen Planeten zu drohen." {n}Solomorne sagt jedes Wort mit ruhiger, aber selbstbewusster Stimme und übertönt sogar die heulenden Sirenen.{/n} "Schon gar nicht, wenn die Lastschiffe auf Befehl des Marschalls nach Dargonus geschickt werden. Und falls Euch das noch nicht reicht, bürge ich persönlich dafür, dass {name} von Valancius nichts mit irgendeinem unbekannten Kriminellen zu schaffen hat."
languages.original_text: "Proctor Yeager, you have no right to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own planet." {n}Solomorne speaks each word in a soft yet confident voice, somehow overriding the wailing sirens.{/n} "Especially when the barges are being sent to Dargonus on the Marshal's orders. If that is not enough for you, I will personally vouch that {name} von Valancius is not in league with some unknown criminal."

Und falls Euch das noch nicht reicht, bürge ich persönlich dafür, dass {name} von Valancius nichts mit irgendeinem unbekannten Kriminellen zu schaffen hat."
